SingleSignOnSettings.name: SingleSignOnSettings
SingleSignOnSettings.label: Single Sign On Settings
SingleSignOnSettings.description: Represents SingleSignOnSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableForceDelegatedCallout.description: enable Force Delegated Callout field of SingleSignOnSettings metadata component.

enableMultipleSamlConfigs.description: enable Multiple Saml Configs field of SingleSignOnSettings metadata component.

enableSamlJitProvisioning.description: enable Saml Jit Provisioning field of SingleSignOnSettings metadata component.

enableSamlLogin.description: enable Saml Login field of SingleSignOnSettings metadata component.
